comment: This is a rectangular text box containing Chinese characters in vertical columns, likely from an ancient dictionary or linguistic text. The characters are written in a traditional style, possibly seal script or clerical script, with accompanying annotations in smaller regular script. The box has a thick black border, and the content is arranged in columns reading top to bottom, right to left. On the right edge, there is a vertical column of smaller text, possibly page numbers or section markers (e.g., '小四十八', '言三十二', '洪章').
